original_title: ONE Fighting Championship 17: Era of Champions
overview: ONE Fighting Championship, in partnership with entertainment giant 7Kings, brings another action-packed night of world-class mixed martial arts (MMA) action to Jakarta, Indonesia, on 14 June. Held at the state-of-the-art 15,000-capacity Mata Elang International Stadium (MEIS), ONE FC: ERA OF CHAMPIONS is the next blockbuster event on the multi-city calendar of ONE FC. Renowned for the non-stop action and adrenaline-pumping fights in the cage, ONE FC has blown away sold-out audiences in the biggest arenas around the world. This will be the third time that the largest Asian MMA promotion returns to Jakarta and it is expected to be yet another sold-out event.
title: ONE Fighting Championship 17: Era of Champions
